name: LatePoint Quick Status
description: A WordPress plugin addon for LatePoint that adds a toggle button to enable/disable services directly from the services list.
author: KNYN.DEV
upgrade_notice: Version 1.1.0 includes GitHub updater integration and enhanced compatibility with LatePoint 5.2.1

sections.description: A WordPress plugin addon for LatePoint that adds a toggle button to enable/disable services directly from the services list. Features include quick toggle functionality, real-time updates, visual feedback, enhanced loading states, and improved notifications.
sections.installation: 1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/latepoint-quick-status directory\n2. Activate the plugin through the 'Plugins' menu in WordPress\n3. Ensure LatePoint 5.2.1+ is installed and activated
sections.changelog:
### 1.1.0
* Added GitHub updater integration
* Enhanced compatibility with LatePoint 5.2.1
* Improved error handling and security
* Better integration with LatePoint Pro Features

### 1.0.0
* Initial release with basic toggle functionality
* AJAX-powered service status changes
* Professional UI styling
